name: Crush the Castle by Namco
description:
Now FREE!

To Arms my Lord! Crush the Castle is now available on Android. The King has ordered you to crush all resistance in order for his kingdom to survive. Unleash your Trebuchet and crush castle after castle by wiping out all of its inhabitants with an arsenal of projectiles. Dominate two Continents with over nine Regions and 90 castles to do battle with. Build and destroy original structures in the Build Your Own mode. Let the crushing begin!
